pullrequest.title: Update list of tests subject to ENABLE_SCREEN_TESTS variable

content.raw: I am testing a fix for the `ViewAngleWidget_TEST` in [fix_viewanglewidget_test](#!/osrf/gazebo/commits/594f227f823c02f7e54dc171ae8c5c7f83f9fa5c) branch. [jenkins gpu](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/). I was able to reproduce the failure over ssh and and confirmed that the test passes with the fix. The problem was that the last iteration of the camera movement animation update is never executed (causing errors to accumulate over the course of the test)
content.html: I am testing a fix for the ViewAngleWidget_TEST in fix_viewanglewidget_test branch. jenkins gpu. I was able to reproduce the failure over ssh and and confirmed that the test passes with the fix. The problem was that the last iteration of the camera movement animation update is never executed (causing errors to accumulate over the course of the test)

content.raw: that's great! I tested it and it looks good, so I merged it into this branch (hope that's alright)
content.html: that's great! I tested it and it looks good, so I merged it into this branch (hope that's alright)

content.html:

content.raw:
All the other tests which this PR enables pass for me.

As a reference, this is how the tests which are still in `ENABLE_SCREEN_TESTS` do on my laptop:

* `ApplyWrenchDialog_TEST`: fail

* `LaserVisualization_TEST`: pass

* `LayersWidget_TEST.cc`: pass

* `MainWindow_TEST`: fail

* `Projection_TEST`: pass

* `ViewAngleWidget_TEST`: fail

*
